gameData.title: An enigmatic Attic
gameData.description:
R to reload battery into flashlight

In the middle of the night, you hear a faint chime from the corridor.
You decide to go investigate. Turns out, the trapdoor to the hotel's attic is open.
SOMETHING WICKED THIS WAY COMES.
YOU CAN ONLY GO FORWARD.
THE PLACE SEEMS UNENDING,
YET YOU KNOW YOU MUST KEEP GOING AS FAR AS YOU CAN,
UNTIL YOUR INEVITABLE FAILURE
AND THAT YOUR ONLY RULE.
IS TO.
M A K E  H A S T E .

gameData.title: Train of Thought
gameData.description:
It's 1874. Step aboard the "Le Grand Voyageur" on her maiden journey journey across Europe where nothing is quite as it seems... Systems on the train are failing, and it‚Äôs up to you to keep everything running smoothly! Can you fix the engine, restore power, and more in time to allow the train to depart?

The Rule? Fix all systems before departure before the time runs out.

Every choice counts. Every second matters. Will you rise to the challenge?

üîß Fix critical systems like water pipes, communication and lighting to allow the train to depart..
üöÇ [NEXT UPDATE] Experience a cross-country adventure from Lyon to Prague, with stunning European landscapes along the way.

‚ö†Ô∏è A PC is recommend for the game to run smoothly.

üèÜ This game was created in a 2-week timeframe as part of the Unite 2024 Game Jam! üèÜ

üé¨ Credits:
- WiseMatheu: Builder/Programmer/UI/GFX
- apoaddda: Programmer
- NicCrimson: Builder / Modeler

gameData.title: A historycal trip [unite 24 submission]
gameData.description:
Take the trip trough the history of Europe 

Prof Unviere have made a time machine but she is lost something really important in the history of Europe go find it but...

theres only one rule. but what join the game so you get to know it

For unite 24 game jam by unviere 

Notes: we made our Ui responsive go check it on different devices small and big (pc) and we support multiplayer but we don't recommend play on console cuz it's not fully supported we also recommend to break the one rule to see what happens 

note for the ribirth you need to find a part to trigger to get the ribirth the rule can you break by comming close to your family

¬©Unviere assets belong to their owner

gameData.title: Mushroomania! üçÑ [Remaking]
gameData.description:
‚ùóRule: Don't pick up Poisonus Mushrooms!

‚ö† We made this game in 4 days (working +10 hours per day) for roblox game jam called as "Unite 2024"
üõ† We are doing a remake - we are going to add more features etc., stay tuned! üëÄ

üçÑ Gather many Mushrooms as possible but don't touch Poisonous Mushrooms or you will die!

üëâ Mushroom picking, or "houba≈ôen√≠", is a beloved tradition in the Czech Republic.
üå≤ Inspired by Czech Republic's forests and mushrooms

üî® Developers are from Czechia 
- supertom145 - Main Scripter, Builder / Modeler, UI

ü§î Are you ready to become the ultimate mushroom forager? Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey into the heart of the forest. Test your skills, embrace the challenge, and see if you can survive the wild, mushroom-filled woods!

gameData.title: ONLY ONE RULE! [Unite 2024 Winner]
gameData.description:
Welcome to ONLY ONE RULE:

¬ª
Locked in a dark, eerie facility, you must follow one rule in each room to survive. Watched closely by those in control, a hidden prisoner offers a chance at escape. Will you be able to escape, or will you end up trapped forever?
¬´

This game was made within 2 weeks for the Unite  '24 Gamejam! All soundtracks were made for the game and you can use them in videos/streams. We recommend to play this game on pc using headphones. Enjoy!

Updates:

24/11/13: Added missing content, polishing & bug fixes

gameData.title: Visit Paris
gameData.description:
This game was made for the Unite 2024 game jam with the theme "There is only one rule"!

Explore the scenery of Paris!
Walk around, chat and have fun!
Invite your friends!

gameData.title: Mitoball: ENGAGE
gameData.description:
Winner of the "Most Engaging Experience" category in the Unite 2024 Challenge.

Created for the Unite 2024 Challenge with the theme "There is Only One Rule."

You are a brave cube in a strange world of odd balls, particularly challenged by a yellow one that undergoes mitosis each time it bounces. ENGAGE in fast-paced, hack n' slash combat with your trusty blade. Combo and BLAST your way through hoards of various genetic mutations. In order to survive, there is only one rule... do not fall off the platform!
